tasks.label: select-constants-generator
tasks.command: if [ "${input:testSize}" = "tiny" ]; then echo "Using tiny test vectors with test constants" && cd ${workspaceFolder}/go/constants && JAM_USE_TEST_CONSTANTS=true go run constants_gen.go; else echo "Using full test vectors with production constants" && cd ${workspaceFolder}/go/constants && go run constants_gen.go; fi

inputs.description: Choose test size (tiny=test constants, full=prod constants)
